sentences.english: Many people deserted their homes during the food shortage.
sentences.chinese: 许多人在饥荒中逃往他乡。

sentences.english: One year, there was a great famine in the State of Qi.
sentences.chinese: 有一年，齐国发生了特大的饥荒。

sentences.english: The famine encouraged the spread of open-air markets throughout North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 饥荒下朝鲜各地露天市场的数量迅速增大。

sentences.english: There was also the fear of famine, of uncontrollable weather.
sentences.chinese: 我们同时也害怕闹饥荒，超出我们控制的天气变化。

sentences.english: More often than not, people faced the risk of famine.
Then there was a famine in the days of David three years, year after year; and David enquired of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 大卫年间有饥荒，一连三年，大卫就求问耶和华。

sentences.english: Regarding the “institutions which, in Niger, said there was a famine”.
sentences.chinese: 关于“在尼日尔的一些机构说有饥荒”一事。

sentences.english: and if I enter into the city, then behold them that are sick with famine!
sentences.chinese: 我若进入城内，就见有因饥荒患病的。

sentences.english: Avoiding famine will depend on a vast expansion of Africa's lagging agricultural productivity.
sentences.chinese: 想要避免饥荒，首先应当提升非洲落后的农业生产力。

sentences.english: Famine eventuated from the crop failure.
sentences.chinese: 因庄稼歉收饥荒终于发生了。

sentences.english: At a time of famine, it was an inflammatory statement.
sentences.chinese: “在饥荒时期”，是一种煽动性的说法。

sentences.english: More than two million children are at risk of malaria and kala-azar in famine-stricken Africa.
sentences.chinese: 超过两百万儿童在饥荒的非洲疟疾和黑热病的风险。

sentences.english: An edict has been issued temporarily abolishing the land tax in Shantung, as the people are unable to pay it owing to the famine.
sentences.chinese: 饥荒使农民无力纳税，山东已发布法令临时取消田赋。

sentences.english: What kind of disaster caused such a national-wide famine?
sentences.chinese: 什么样的自然灾害能弄得全国闹饥荒？

sentences.english: She has become so poor that she has little power of resisting famines.
sentences.chinese: 印度已经穷得对饥荒没有抵御能力了。

definition: destitute and homeless (idiom); forced from one's home and wandering about/displaced
insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
